name: hm06
effect: Teaches Rock Smash to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Dive to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV & III: Rock Smash Gen II: Whirlpool)

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: The user slugs the foe with a shattering punch. It can also smash cracked boulders.
flavor_text.platinum: The user slugs the foe with a shattering punch. It can also smash cracked boulders.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: The user slugs the foe with a shattering punch. It can also smash cracked boulders.
